law.catch_line: Application of chapter and of state plumbing code.

text.section: This chapter applies and shall be in full force and effect in all counties of the Commonwealth.

The state plumbing code promulgated by the department under the provisions of this chapter applies and shall be in full force and effect for all public buildings regardless of location in the Commonwealth.
This chapter shall not apply to farmsteads.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1671, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 61. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 1. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 194, sec. 1. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 222, sec. 2.
